root: ^Oi Makra! Pass me the salt! The stew's not salty enough!
^Trust me, It'll be one of me greatest meals!
^Here you go and here's the potatoes you asked me to slice.
^Thanks mate! Now potatoes, meat and some greens.  Now we wait for it to simmer for some time.
^Where did you learn to cook like that?
^Medic's school, you'd be surprised how much our alimentation helps in recovering faster and you know not getting sick.
^Yeah we learned a lot of things back then before I got kicked out, because of that c*nt of a headmaster!
^Yeah! Can't believe they said I aggravated the bandits! They were the ones who attacked us!
^Yup! It was a sh**t show, I even punched the headmaster's windows after that.
^That was deserved... You just tried to defend everyone... but it is true that the school almost got completely burned down...
^Never mind all that. let's just finish the meal.
